description: A pun showcasing a literal interpretation of ignorance and apathy.
title: Careless Query
n_1: Alex looks puzzled, scratching his head with a book in hand.
c1_1: Ever wonder about ignorance and apathy?
n_2: Jamie shrugs, uninterested, as Alex reads aloud.
n_3: Alex closes the book, looking more confused.
n_4: They both chuckle, realizing the irony.
